casebody.data:
HARRIS
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 110A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2017 Tamika L. Henderson, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department Of Public Safety. Michael C. Byrne, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Steven.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of April 2017 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of April 2017."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 8th day of June 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
